bibl.title: The Short Reports of the Institute of the Peoples of Asia. Studies in Memoriam E.E. Bertels
bibl.seg: Korostovtsev M.A., Egipetskoye proiskhozhdeniye romana ob aleksandre. [The Egyptian Origin of the Romance on Alexander.]
